original_text: And the king put Benaiah the son of Jehoiada in his room over the host: and Zadok the priest did the king put in the room of Abiathar.
korean_text: 왕이 이에 여호야다의 아들 브나야를 요압을 대신하여 군사령관으로 삼고 또 제사장 사독으로 아비아달을 대신하게 하니라

sentences.original_text: And the king put Benaiah the son of Jehoiada
in his room over the host
did the king put in the room of Abiathar
